msst2ap: Mastering Shiny Shiny Test 2 App Package

msst2ap-package.Rd

This Shiny app-package demonstrates testing with testthat and shinytest2 using the examples from from Mastering Shiny (mastering-shiny.org).

See also

Useful links:
